name: Submodule.Quotient.instDiscreteMeasurableSpaceQuotient
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Ring R
inst✝³ : AddCommGroup M
inst✝² : Module R M
p : Submodule R M
inst✝¹ : MeasurableSpace M
inst✝ : DiscreteMeasurableSpace M
⊢ DiscreteMeasurableSpace (HasQuotient.Quotient M p)
decl:
instance [MeasurableSpace M] [DiscreteMeasurableSpace M] : DiscreteMeasurableSpace (M ⧸ p) :=
  Quotient.instDiscreteMeasurableSpace
